title: sundarEshvarAya
sahitya:
sundarEshvarAya namastE sadAnandAya sOma


anupallavi

 manda smitAnanAya madhurApurI nilayAya mAdhavAdyamara vandita mangaLa varapradAya


caraNam   bhAnukOTi prakAshAya bhAsamAna shashidharAya bhAratIsha pUjitAya bhadrakALI sEvitAya 
mInAkSI mOhitAya mOkSa sAkSAtkArAya mahA mantra svarUpAya gaNapati guruguha nutAya
